**Note:** Do not send any physical copy of the application/documents to CII / FICCI. 
> **Selection Parameters:**


 - The projects should be innovative and of high scientific merit; with discrete R&amp;D as opposed to exploratory investigation. 
 - The proposed research project should have a high commercialization potential.

ctu_text: "}]}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Key Features of the Fellowship:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "In addition to the attractive scholarship, the Prime Minister\u2019s Fellowship emphasizes providing a unique and invigorating experience to selected fellows. It ensures the best national and international exposure for them and provides mentoring through industry and academic experts through the mechanism of annual review meetings. In addition, periodic mentorship sessions are also organized with the help of expert external agencies.
